super jeu rien à dire de plus . l'histoire est génial les clins d'oeils sont cools et l'humour est très drole

玩这个游戏不是很连贯，前前后后断断续续玩了两年，自己的智商并不高，还是有那么3,4个关卡是看了攻略才过的，
连续不断的关卡固然让人有点烦躁，但是不断的许诺的‘惊喜’和剧情本身的推动让人又有了玩下去的动力，最后的剧情很棒，照应了之前用月尘做原料，最后的最后，击败反叛的蓝眼，被glados拯救治疗，然而面对这似敌似友的微妙关系，也许分别才是最好的选择，
坐着气体传输梯，在机器人的合唱中离场，音乐出来的那一刻我真的忍不住哭了，那种感觉就像一个坐了很长时间的牢的罪犯终于被释放，全监狱的狱友和狱警都在为他送行，再被送向地面的时候，我的内心十分激动，自己心心念念的自然马上就会出现，但是看着往日的杀人机器现在却整齐排列的演奏着动人的音乐，我却十分不舍，这种复杂的心情转化成了湿润的眼睛和哽咽的呼吸，踏出小屋的那一刻，看着外面的蓝天白云，风圈麦浪，我再一次达到感情高潮，蓦然回首，只是一个孤零零的小破屋蹲在苍穹下广阔无边的麦田中。
传送门，永远的神作。

Well made game, lots of detail everywhere - especially in the graphics, but not too much to make me lag. Story and gameplay is pretty cool overall, the puzzles were challenging enough to make me think but not so impossible that I couldn't solve them. I thoroughly enjoyed playing this! Definitely worth getting.

Der Multiplayer/Coop modus ist auch cool,ich wünsche mir einen Teil 3 für dieses Spiel.

I LOVE THIS GAME! It's one of my favourite games ever. Being able to make my own levels with the editor is one of the best parts.

I did find a glitch with it though (I think). When you create a test chamber you have a window, an exit and an entrance. It says that you cannot clone or delete them, but I can press C with the window selected to duplicate it. If I do that, I can't delete it again. But I don't mind, it looks nice with some of the chambers that I have made. (the glitch doesn't break anything, it just creates a second window)

My favourite game of all time! Fantastic story with extremely fun game-play, puzzles, and especially the deep lore surrounding the entire Portal universe. The CO-OP is very fun and even comes with its own little story and just builds on what Portal and Portal 2 did. 10/10 would recommend for everyone to play!
